recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER - The plaintiffs' requests that Cargill's motions for summary judgment be denied or continued pending additional discovery, pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 56(f), are denied. Cargill's motions for summa ry judgment (Case No. 4:04CV3384, filing  329 ; Case No.  4:07CV3170, filing 59) are granted, and the plaintiffs' claims are dismissed with prejudice.  Judgment shall be entered by a separate document filed in each case. With respect to Case No.  4:04CV3384, the court expressly finds that there is no just reason for delay, and directs that a final judgment shall be entered dismissing Cargill from the action pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 54(b). Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (GJG)
